command_pattern

Class ActionButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • command_pattern.ActionButton

  • public class ActionButton
extends java.lang.Object
    Interpreter acts as the invoker, listening to what the player wants and linking up a relevant action for a method to do

    • Method Detail

      • interpret

        public void interpret(java.util.List<java.lang.String> user_input)

      • setLimits

        public void setLimits(int min_words,
                      int max_words)
        Optional. If wanting an action command word to have more than 3 and less than 1; the default min and max words, you can set the limits per command. For instance, useful when stripping the user input and checking if an action has the right amount of words inputted.
        Parameters:
        min_words - the minimum number of words a user has to enter
        max_words - the maximum number of words a user has to enter

      • getMin

        public int getMin()

      • getMax

        public int getMax()

      • withinLimits

        public boolean withinLimits(java.util.List<java.lang.String> user_input,
                            java.lang.String command_word)
        As a key, check whether the user's input matches a particular command word within a desired range of required words.
        Parameters:
        user_input - the array list of strings, coming from the user after processing
        command_word - the string to compare against, generally a valid command word
        Returns:
